description:
This course will cover the fundamentals to get your started flying, filming, and creating your first aerial video. From setting up the drone, learning the app, camera techniques, live flights, and video editing and more.

This course is taught by an experienced travel aerial videographer teacher. but is catered towards beginners. It's filmed in different locations from Vancouver to Thailand. The course is taught with the DJI Phantom Pro 3, and is applicable to all Phantom 3's and most content is applicable to Phantom 4
title: Beginner-friendly Travel Aerial Photography
